headline: Is Huntington Ingalls (HII) Still Reasonably Priced After Its Strong 145.8% One Year Rally
summary: If you are wondering whether Huntington Ingalls Industries is still attractively priced after a strong run, this article will walk through what the current share price really reflects. The stock recently closed at US$392.70, with returns of 12.3% year to date and 145.8% over the past year, alongside a 4.9% decline over the last week and a 1.4% decline over the last month. Recent news around the defense sector, including ongoing focus on military spending priorities and contract activity for...
